lessonSubtitleText: Test how well you know this story

questions.text: What did Jesus ask John to do for him?
What did Jesus say to convince John to baptize him?
answers: This is a part of God's holy plan
It will make people like us
God will punish you if you don't

questions.text: What things happened during Jesus' baptism?
answers: Heavens opened, Spirit descended, God spoke
Water turned into wine, angels appeared, crowds cheered
The river dried up, thunder sounded, fire fell
Jesus started walking on the water

questions.text: After his baptism, where did the Spirit lead Jesus?
answers: Into the desert wilderness to be tempted
To the middle of the Sea of Galilee

questions.text: How long was Jesus tempted in the wilderness? What did he eat?
answers: Seven days, he ate bread and water
One year, he ate only fruit

questions.text: How did the devil tempt Jesus with stones?
answers: Use them to build a throne

questions.text: What did the devil offer to Jesus if he worshiped him?
What did the devil say would happen if Jesus jumped off the temple?
What did Jesus say when the devil told him to jump off the temple?
answers: It is written, Do not test God
You have no power over me

questions.text: After 40 days, what did the devil do?
answers: The devil won because Jesus sinned
